entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to by name.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, mentioned alongside him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Another one of Harry's friends, also mentioned alongside him.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is a member of the Weasley family and is married to Fleur.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is Bill's wife and has removed Griphook's shoes.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: A goblin who is being taken care of by Bill.

entities.name: sword of gryffindor
entities.description: The sword that Gryffindor house owns and Griphook is clutching.

entities.name: sea
entities.description: A geographical location visible from the window.

entities.name: sunrise
entities.description: The time of day when the sun is rising.

relationships.description: Harry is taking care of Griphook by bringing him to Bill's room.
Bill and Fleur are married, as mentioned in the text.
Griphook is clutching the sword of Gryffindor.
Harry and Ron are friends, as mentioned in the text.
Hermione is also a friend of Harry's.
